scripts.build: npm run build-types && npm run build-locales && npm run bundle-trackers && npm run build-firefox && npm run build-chrome && npm run build-apple && npm run build-android && npm run build-windows && npm run build-integration && npm run build-chrome-mv3
scripts.build-apple: node scripts/entry-points.js --platform apple && node scripts/entry-points.js --platform apple-isolated
scripts.build-android: node scripts/entry-points.js --platform android && node scripts/entry-points.js --platform android-autofill-password-import && node scripts/entry-points.js --platform android-broker-protection
scripts.test-int: npm run build-integration && npm run playwright
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit && npm run test-int && npm run playwright
scripts.preplaywright: npm run build-windows && npm run build-apple && npm run build-android
scripts.preplaywright-headed: npm run build-windows && npm run build-apple && npm run build-android
scripts.preplaywright-e2e: npm run build-windows && npm run build-apple
